item.title: Learn AWK with Emacs
item.description: Intro This post describes my workflow for learning the AWK programming language using Emacs, Org mode and Org-drill. The workflow may work for other programming languages. The post won't cover details on how to use Emacs, Org mode or Org-drill. It's intention is to provide a general overview of a workflow. A git repo is available with flash cards, note book and some text files here. Content I just read a few chapters in the "The AWK programming language" book and found AWK to be awesome and I want to learn more of the language.
